title: 30 Top-Rated Chicken Breast Recipes
description: These top-rated chicken breast recipes are guaranteed to get you through the week with bold, unexpected flavor.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 30 Seriously Delicious Chicken Breast Recipes If you're looking for new and unexpected ways to cook a chicken breast, we're here for you. By Vicky McDonald Vicky McDonald Vicky McDonald is a Seattle-based editor with over 15 years of experience in the media industry. She currently works as an editor for ParentMap.com. Prior to that, she was a senior content manager at Allrecipes. She loves baking, developing new recipes, and growing vegetables. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Updated on February 2, 2024 Close Credits: Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Chicken breasts are our healthy, delicious go-to for making great meals, but it's easy to get stuck in a rut and rely on the same old recipes. If you're looking for new and unexpected ways to cook a chicken breast, we're here for you. These top-rated recipes are community favorites and have been reviewed by thousands of home cooks. Find your favorite new chicken breast recipe today. 01 of 31 Baked Caesar Chicken View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios "For this baked Caesar chicken recipe, chicken breast is coated in a creamy dressing and sprinkled with buttery Parmesan topping resulting in crispy, juicy chicken." —Juliana Hale 02 of 31 Buffalo Chicken Sliders View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios "These Buffalo chicken sliders, made with shredded chicken tossed in spicy Buffalo sauce and ranch dressing, baked on Hawaiian sweet rolls with plenty of melty cheese, are good for a game day crowd, or a quick and easy family dinner." —Amanda Holstein 03 of 31 Chicken Florentine View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios "Chicken Florentine, with perfectly-seared boneless chicken breasts in a creamy white wine and spinach sauce, is a complete, one-skillet dinner, easy enough for a weeknight, fancy enough for a date night." —Renu Dhar 04 of 31 Grilled Lemon Pepper Chicken View Recipe Save "This is a super easy recipe for lemon pepper grilled chicken. While the chicken is marinating, you have time to prep your sides to serve alongside the grilled chicken." —John Somerall 05 of 31 Birria de Pollo (Chicken Birria) View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios "This birria de pollo is deeply flavorful, rich, hearty, a little smoky and just plain delicious." —Liv Dansky 06 of 31 Sheet Pan Chicken Fajita Quesadillas View Recipe Save fabeveryday "My take on the brilliant sheet pan quesadilla hack that's making the rounds — these chicken fajita quesadillas come out savory, crispy, and gooey in the oven." —fabeveryday 07 of 31 Grilled Chicken Salad with Seasonal Fruit View Recipe Save Maisan Djuhadi "This is a GREAT salad! I cut the oil in half to reduce calories and fat. My husband agreed that this was the kind of salad we usually only get in restaurants," Patsy says. 08 of 31 Lucky's Quickie Chickie View Recipe Save France C "This raises the bar on a simple to make chicken dinner. I followed the recipe exactly including fresh basil which was so terrific in this dish with the honey and balsamic. Five stars for a simple and flavorful dish you can whip up in no time," Ellie says. 09 of 31 Lemon Herb Chicken with Couscous and Cucumber Salad View Recipe Save Allrecipes "This was a winner! I loved all the flavors and how it came together. Using thin-sliced chicken breasts worked perfect. I'd make this again for dinner/work lunches." — voraciousgirl 10 of 31 Chicken Marsala View Recipe Save "I found this recipe to be the BEST Chicken Marsala recipe I've used. It was quick and easy. I served it over rice along with sauteed green string beans. It won everyone over. This is definitely going to become a regular dinner item at my house!" — MARIANNA1978 11 of 31 Dijon-Tarragon Cream Chicken View Recipe Save LynnInHK "My family, including my three year old, loved this. It was quick and easy. The chicken was juicy, and my husband loved the sauce so much that he poured it over everything he ate!" — LILYROSEK 12 of 31 Sweet, Sticky and Spicy Chicken View Recipe Save Photo by Allrecipes Magazine. "This dish was very easy to make and it tasted wonderful. The flavors came together really well. I paired it with jasmine rice and an oriental veggie blend. My husband enjoyed it as well. It's one of our new favorite dishes," says Shelli S. says. 13 of 31 Curry Stand Chicken Tikka Masala Sauce View Recipe Save sleepybot "This recipe is absolutely fantastic. While it may seem like a lot of work, to the uninitiated, it is completely worth every second. I didn't change a thing, it's perfect the way it is. This has become a staple in my house. It freezes well, and even storing in the fridge as leftovers. It reheats superbly." — diochick 14 of 31 Quick Chicken Piccata View Recipe Save Sydney Bassing "Amazing just the way it is! Soooo delicious. My four-year-old closed his eyes, smiled with his mouth full and told me that it was super yummy. Thank you!" says one happy Allrecipes community member. 15 of 31 Cheddar Baked Chicken View Recipe Save "This is a household favorite, and so easy to make. I almost always have the ingredients on hand. I added a sprinkle of basil to mine, and it came out delicious. It's a must have for quick weekday meals," Katie Briggs 16 of 31 Chicken Pot Pie IX View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine "Delicious! My only regret is that I only made one. I'd definitely make this again," Brenda says. 17 of 31 Chicken Cordon Bleu II View Recipe Save France C "FANTASTIC chicken recipe! I've made it several times and the only thing that I do differently is doubling up on the sauce. Which by the way, is out of this world! Try it, I think you'll be very happy you did!" — DZFIT4LIFE 18 of 31 Creamy White Chili View Recipe Save Melissa Goff "This was the perfect blend of seasonings and cream. I topped this with colby jack cheese and served with Frito Scoops. This will definitely be made in my kitchen!" — adavis76 19 of 31 Lemon Chicken Orzo Soup View Recipe Save Photo by *Sherri*. "Amazing! Did not change a thing. Lovely balance of chicken and lemon in broth — fresh lemon is a must," Dayna says. 20 of 31 Spicy Garlic Lime Chicken View Recipe Save Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Reviewers love the zesty kick and bright, citrusy flavor of this chicken breast recipe. Try pairing with seasoned rice or a fruit salad for a complete meal. 21 of 31 Creamy Chicken and Wild Rice Soup View Recipe Save TTV78 "I'd describe this soup as comforting. The flavors and thickness turn a gray day into a great day." — Brown Sugar Girl 22 of 31 Chicken Katsu View Recipe Save "Don't change a thing! Reminds me of Hawaiian plate lunch, yum! I made this exactly as written and it turned out perfect. Crispy outside, tender inside. I served it with Kikkoman Katsu Sauce," Misty says. 23 of 31 Slow Cooker Chicken Taco Soup View Recipe Save Allrecipes Magazine "This recipe is FANTASTIC! I highly recommend it! I have eaten the leftovers almost every meal since I made it. It is easy, delicious, and has lots of healthy vegetables."— LVBNMOM 24 of 31 Mulligatawny Soup I View Recipe Save Molly "I absolutely love this soup! It's my new favorite comfort food. I usually bring some for lunch and my colleagues always ask for the recipe." — SGARLOW 25 of 31 Chicken Breasts with Balsamic Vinegar and Garlic View Recipe Save chibi chef "I thought this was a pretty impressive dish considering the ease of preparation. Also, I liked that it's made with ingredients I always have on hand." — MSLLL75 26 of 31 Chicken and Wild Rice Soup View Recipe Save Chicken and Wild Rice Soup. Kim With quick-cooking wild rice, mushrooms, pearl onions, chicken broth, and half-and-half, this recipe transforms chicken breasts into something deliciously different. You'll have a nutritious dinner on the table in 30 minutes. 27 of 31 Bruschetta Chicken Bake View Recipe Save "This is now THE dish I make to bring to others (with new babies, illness, etc.), and I am always asked for the recipe. I had so many wives calling me to tell me their husband insisted they get the recipe, that I now include the recipe with the dish." — KIMINCLEVELAND 28 of 31 Southwestern Egg Rolls View Recipe Save Photo by Aja. "Oh. My. Goodness. These are HEAVEN! These are my FAVORITE item at Chili's Restaurant and I must say, mine were much better, definitely healthier, and obviously cheaper!" — jennybeans 29 of 31 Aztec Chicken with Sweet Potato Corn Mash View Recipe Save "A great taste of central Mexico with a little heat and quite a bit of flavor!" shares recipe creator Vintage Chef. "Garnish with two halves grilled plantain or banana and cilantro." 30 of 31 5-Ingredient Red Curry Chicken View Recipe Save "Mine was spicy and delicious!" raves reviewer Donna. "I also added Thai basil from my garden, frozen peas, broccoli and zucchini and served it over brown rice. It was delicious and super easy to make." 31 of 31 More Inspiration France C 6 Chicken Breast Mistakes That Can Easily Leave You With a Dry, Flavorless Meal 12 Favorite Bone-In Chicken Breast Recipes 15+ Fancy Chicken Recipes With 5-Star Ratings Explore more: Recipes Meat and Poultry Chicken Chicken Breast Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
